TopicTitle: I.K.R.A.A (International Kerbal Rocketry and Areonautics Association) Hub

Articles.Content:
IGNORE THE POLL, the only vote was me, and I decided a way to comprise.

Welcome to the main thread of the IKRAA, this will be based on Kerbal Space Agency, however it will be different. This thread will showcase missions and info on those missions. More threads will be added for projects (Apollo is an example)

The main difference between the IKRAA and the KSA is the fact that this will be more game based than the KSA. (By this I mean that the KSA mimics NASA, this will be more of a "player's journey")

This will be carrer however if a save breaking update comes out, I will switch to sandbox. (The only reson I'm doing carrer is for mission ideas, and a foundation for this series)

Edited February 20, 2015 by MrWalrus123
